title: I need help with an issue regarding buying RP. PLEASE.
body:
I attempted to purchase RP at 10:14 AM yesterday and it said I have exceeded the number of attempts at this time. I waited until 1:20PM TODAY to purchase RP and it still says I have to wait 24 hours. Is there anyone who can shead light on my situation and help me purchase RP soon? I want to get Forsaken Jayce before it is off sale. :(

EDIT: [Purchase RP] Button in store is gone in my client. Riot please. This frightens me that I can't support your game anymore :(

EDIT: [Purchase RP] Button is back. Still can't purchase RP. "please wait 24 hours"

replies.body: I have been waiting 3-4 days now what to do pls help?

RP Purchasing was briefly disabled earlier today for maintenance, but should be back now!

As to the error you're seeing- I'd recommend [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Just based on what you've said, my assumption is that there are potentially some issues between your bank and our bank which could be causing you to see this error longer than normal.  Usually we just ask players to wait a few days before attempting more purchases for the errors to clear up.

If you go ahead and submit the ticket now, I imagine we'll be able to honor the sale for you once the error clears up :)  Alternatively, you can look at purchasing RP cards or the like if you don't want to wait the few days.
